page.title: 10School Events, Evesham.
page.content: Every year we have{harvest festival}at church.We sing hymns and take fruit to the vicar and have prayers.At{Christ- {mas}the Juniors{act a play}about Jesus being born.The Infants act a fairy tale and sing songs.We also have a{party}with games and food and drink.Some children go on {Youth {Hostel}Summer Weekend.They have fun on the beach and in the sea,sleep in bunk-beds and go on long walks.The whole school has a{Sports Day;}we have all sorts of races.This year our {Outing}was to a safari park. We have {discos;}if it is Hallowe'en we dress up as all sorts of scary things. We have flashing coloured lights and a big record player and have pop and crisps. We have a{swimming gala against other schools.Every year we have{open evenings}when our parents come to school to see our teachers.
